SEARCH
Package de.tinf.collections

Class ArrayUtils

java.lang.Object
de.tinf.collections.ArrayUtils
public class ArrayUtils extends Object
The ArrayUtils class provides utility methods for manipulating arrays.

      T - the type of the array
      Parameters:
      array - the array to reverse
      Returns:
      the reversed array

    • contains

      public static boolean contains(byte[] array, byte element)

    • contains

      public static boolean contains(short[] array, short element)
      Checks if the specified array contains the given element.
      Parameters:
      array - the array to be checked for the presence of the element
      element - the element to be checked for in the array
      Returns:
      true if the array contains the specified element, false otherwise

    • find

      public static <T> T find(T[] array, Predicate<T> predicate)
      Finds the first element in the given array that matches the specified predicate.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of elements in the array
      Parameters:
      array - the array to search through
      predicate - the predicate to apply to each element to determine if it matches
      Returns:
      the first element that matches the predicate, or null if no such element is found
